price: We have written in the Psalms[44] after the Preserved Record[45], that the land will be inherited by My righteous slaves.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَتَبۡنَا فِي ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ أَنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِيَ ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ
footnotes:
[44] i.e., the Scriptures.
 [45] i.e., after inscribing it in al-Lawh al-Mahfūz.
